title: Step 1: From strong ideas
description: Do you dream of becoming an independent entrepreneur? Do you have a brilliant idea but don't know how to start it?

title: Step 2: To smart plans
description: Looking for a tool to develop your business plan? Do you want a well-founded plan that easily convinces potential investors?

title: Step 3: Until you boot
description: Are you ready to really get started? Do you want to make sure you don't overlook any of the obligations?

title: Your own business
description: How can you optimize your business operations after the start-up and how can you lay a good foundation for sustainable business?
